title.value: Современное состояние и пути увеличения эффективности производства картофеля в Гродненской области [Беларусь]
Modern condition and ways of increase in potato production efficiency in the Grodno district [Belarus]
Modern condition and ways of increase in potato production efficiency in the Grodno district [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shcherbuk, N.S., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was analysed the current state and the basic tendencies of potato (Solanum tuberosum) in the Grodno region, prospects of development of branch are defined. For last 15 years total gathering of a potato in the Grodno area has decreased on 9,7% though productivity of this culture has increased almost in 2 times. In 2012 landowners of region are going to increase productivity of a potato up to 400 centers/hectares. It is planned due to application of new technologies and modern high-efficiency techniques, concentration of potato manufacture in the specialized large commodity agricultural enterprises, integration of the enterprises on manufacture and processing of a potato or construction of lines on potato processing on the basis of a facility to achieve high parameters. For storage of a new crop in ten facilities of region construction, modernization and reconstruction of a potatoes' storehouses in the general capacity 14 thousand t is conducted.
